about_the_game:
"Chinese Overtime" is a work simulator developed by an independent developer over two years. In the game, you will play as a recent graduate embarking on a magical work journey.

Game Features

  • Realistic Job Hunting Experience

Choose to screw bolts in a factory or be a security guard at a nightclub—the choice is yours.

  • Balance Work and Life

You will face endless work tasks and overtime demands, balancing all aspects of work and life, experiencing the pressures and challenges of the workplace. Of course, you can also slack off and find a survival path that suits you.

  • Rich Social Interactions

Develop romantic relationships with different beauties and experience another kind of life. Interact with colleagues in the workplace to enhance important character attributes.

  • Adventure Mechanism

Various adventures may happen on your way home from work. You can choose to help others or buy yourself a lucky scratch-off ticket.

  • Diversified Lifestyles

You can choose to exercise and study to improve yourself, or play games until you see stars and foam at the mouth.

  • Multiple Endings

Your choices are crucial. The game includes multiple endings waiting for you to explore.

Character Screenshots

Game Feedback

If you encounter any bugs, please contact me through the contact information on the store page or the discussion area. I look forward to your feedback.

Acknowledgements

Thank you to my family for their unconditional support. Making a game alone is very challenging. Without your support, I could never have done it.

Thank you to Hu Dapang for comprehensive testing of the early version of the game. As an experienced player, you know how to spur a lazy creator.

Thanks to everyone who purchased "Chinese Overtime". The game may not be perfect, but you must be someone who loves life.
